entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
